price: On that Day you will see the wicked bound together in chains[39],
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَصۡفَادِ
footnotes: [39] i.e., their hands and feet will be chained to their necks. See 40:70-72.
